cast.original_title: バイオハザード ヴェンデッタ
cast.overview: BSAA Chris Redfield enlists the help of government agent Leon S. Kennedy and Professor Rebecca Chambers from Alexander Institute of Biotechnology to stop a death merchant with a vengeance from spreading a deadly virus in New York.
cast.title: Resident Evil: Vendetta

cast.overview: Video game bad guy Ralph and fellow misfit Vanellope von Schweetz must risk it all by traveling to the World Wide Web in search of a replacement part to save Vanellope's video game, Sugar Rush. In way over their heads, Ralph and Vanellope rely on the citizens of the internet — the netizens — to help navigate their way, including an entrepreneur named Yesss, who is the head algorithm and the heart and soul of trend-making site BuzzzTube.
cast.title: Ralph Breaks the Internet

details.biography: Jason Hightower is an actor and writer, known for Star Wars: Resistance (2018), Red Dead Redemption II (2018) and Ralph Breaks the Internet (2018).
details.name: Jason Hightower
